title: How to Style a Short Haircut | AXE | Instagroom
description:
Max’s hair is very stubborn. This is how he tames it.

THE TOOLS:
AXE Urban Messy Look Flexible Paste 

THE STEPS:
1. Rub paste on hands
2. Rake back
3. Tidy it up with a comb

Subscribe to the AXE channel for more grooming tips.

asset.author: AXE

transcripts: My hair is very stubborn. Normally I start with towel dried hair. Get a semi­circle of paste, rub it through my hands and push it through my hair. Get a comb, tidy it all up. Normally it looks good, but with my hair you never know.
